title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, generate, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”); supports RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, pull, list models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate, embed, and manage local models.

title: ollama-cli (deno)
summary: Deno-based CLI for interactive chatting with Ollama models; REPL with history and syntax highlight.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-chatbot (Streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chatbot UI that talks to Ollama; supports conversation memory and parameter tuning.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Lightweight Bash wrapper around curl to interact with Ollama’s REST API from scripts.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator for NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks including GPU, CPU, and Open-WebUI combinations.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration for Ollama4j; inject Ollama service with application.yml.

title: ollama-npm-package
summary: Official npm package for JavaScript/TypeScript; 5 kB, zero runtime deps, ESM & CommonJS.

title: ollama-pypi-package
summary: Official PyPI package; install via pip, supports sync & async chat, generate, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; strongly typed req/res, tokio streaming, model management.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; small surface, context cancellation, streaming support.
